hints.content:
The bar for May lines up with $\purpleD{45}$ on the scale.  


[[☃ image 1]]

Andy completed $\purpleD{45}$ math facts per minute in May.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Month and the vertical axis labeled Math Facts per Minute. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: September, December, February, and May. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, and 50. The bar line for each month shows the following: September bar line extends to 20, December bar line extends to the middle of 30 and 40, February bar line extends to the middle of 30 and 40, and May bar line extends to the middle of 40 and 50. A violet line labeled 45 is drawn to the right from 45, which reaches to the end of May bar line labeled 45. !

hints.content:
The bar for September lines up with $\greenD{20}$ on the scale.  


[[☃ image 1]]

Andy completed $\greenD{20}$ math facts per minute in September.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Month and the vertical axis labeled Math Facts per Minute. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: September, December, February, and May. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, and 50. The bar line for each month shows the following: September bar line extends to 20, December bar line extends to the middle of 30 and 40, February bar line extends to the middle of 30 and 40, and May bar line extends to the middle of 40 and 50. A green line is drawn to the right from 20, which reaches to the end of September bar line labeled 20. !

hints.content: Andy completed $\blueD{25}$ more math facts per minute in May than September.

question.content:
Andy timed himself throughout the school year to see how many math facts he could complete in $1$ minute.


[[☃ image 1]]

**How many more math facts per minute did Andy complete in  May than in September?**

[[☃ input-number 1]] math facts per minute

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Month and the vertical axis labeled Math Facts per Minute. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: September, December, February, and May. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, and 50. The bar line for each month shows the following: September bar line extends to 20, December bar line extends to the middle of 30 and 40, February bar line extends to the middle of 30 and 40, and May bar line extends to the middle of 40 and 50. !
